Name: Nathan Lapin
Review: So cool! Great spot in Toronto

Name: Howard Chang
Review: Outbreak was fun

Name: Jan azhly Santiago
Review: Super nice thanks

Name: DXHHH101
Review: Super cool, definitely a shift from my at home VR. Being able to walk around really adds another layer to the immersion!!

Name: Steven Fingold
Review: Great VR experience, more immersive than home VR sets.

Name: Jarrod Feng
Review: An absolutely UNIQUE VR experience that you can't get at home!!! Casuals and VR enthusiasts will both really love this!!!!

Name: SunE
Review: Came here with a party of 7. We did the outbreak experience. It breaks the group into 2 but we are playing the same game. The 2 groups meet up at certain sections to fight together but other times your with the smaller team. It was a fun experience, wished the game mode was a bit longer. The staff here are super nice and welcoming. You get sent a link to see your stats and a recording of your session after the game is over.

Name: K T
Review: So much fun!! Great space and staff. I will definitely be back.

Name: Nyyksi B
Review: Either way, would visit again, but for a more special occasion.

Name: Brain Puddle
Review: Fun but a bit structured. Would have liked less on rails like action, but fun nonetheless!

Name: Jessyca Swift
Review: Had such a great time at Zero Latency! We had a lot of fun playing the games and the staff was more than helpful. Shoutout to Jack, Ben, Kevin and Quinn for making it a great experience!

Name: jovita shetty
Review: Amazing staff, superb place.We tried the zombie game, it was first time playing virtual reality. Will definitely come back

Name: K S
Review: Such a fun experience! The venue is HUGE which is such a game changer because you can walk around and be fully immersed in the game. Also huge shout out to AJ - he was super kind and guided us through everything! Highly recommend coming here!!

Name: Huss Ali
Review: Great experience

Name: Mike O'.
Review: Great fun, great space, great staff!

Name: Sami Harb
Review: Too much fun

Name: Kelvin Phillip
Review: This place is wicked fun. As an avid gamer in surprised by the way how this game was able to wow me. The zombies really had me questioning everything. It's super immersive, and the staff were very helpful.

Name: Yuxing Wang
Review: Outbreak also looked fun

Name: Kasun Jayakody
Review: Amazing free-roam vr experience here. The team at Zero Latency were very friendly and were great at guiding through setting up and using the VR tech. Thank you!

Name: Dana Liu
Review: Super fun! This was as close to real life as you can get I think

Name: Jared Malcolm
Review: Great experience. Highly recommend the zombie game mode.

Name: Nataliia Tvarovska
Review: Very good. The headsets make burns on my forehead but otherwise fun

Name: Chris Sales
Review: did a private booking w them for my GF's 30th birthday and had so much fun!!! AJ and his team are all super nice and helpful and all of us had an amazing time! would highly recommend!!

Name: Meer
Review: All in all, I would recommend Zero Latency VR to any and all. This is Glahiem, signing off. Love, yeah?

Name: Ahnaf Wajeeh
Review: STINKYDOODOOFART out.

Name: zoovie zoovie
Review: Great experience, they have great selection of VR games and it is very immersive.

Name: lorenzo Moreno
Review: Great spot for VR in Toronto, great games and the wonderful staff is very kind and helpful. Definitely a great experience if you are interested in VR.

Name: Vincent Pham
Review: Great experience!! Staff was very nice and guided through the simulation. 10/10 would come again

Name: Jonathan Scodeller
Review: Friendly vibe, good experience, staff is very knowledgeable, and a good workout

Name: Scrobin
Review: This is just like the simulations!

Name: Yessenia Damiron
Review: I went with my family and partner and each one of us was wowed by this. Aside from the experience the staff is so friendly and attentive! They also took the best content for me! We truly enjoyed our time here and we will be going back. I actually think this years birthday will be spent here, because did  I mention they have a lounge that overseas the arena so you can reserve it for  your party!

Name: Tim H
Review: Next-level VR gaming!  So exciting, my heart was pounding and my Garmin actually tracked it as exercise!  My kid and I had an absolute blast!

Name: Bonnie Quirante
Review: Been here twice already! Host are super nice!

Name: Rick Boomer
Review: Great experience for my younger brothers birthday! Definitely recommend.

Name: KIMBERLY JACKSON
Review: We had a great time as a family. I would highly recommend for all ages.

Name: Alfonso Paz
Review: a very good experience, 100% recommend it

Name: Kamini Persaud
Review: Booked a two hour slot for me and 12 if my friends. Had an awesome time but wish we could have fit in more than two games. Staff was super friendly and booking was easy

Name: Samantha B
Review: So much fun and the staff was very friendly and kind.

Name: Mathi Dash
Review: It was awsome

Name: Crw
Review: We had a great time playing. Looked after by very friendly staff.. Wish the game time was more than 30 minutes.

Name: mia pardo
Review: Amazing VR experience! Highly recommend! So much fun!!!!

Name: Imran Khan
Review: Wonderful experience, everyone should try this. It's Worth spending every penny.

Name: Melis Kocak
Review: Wonderful experience!! Highly recommend!

Name: Shawn A (Shawn)
Review: Fun experience for all ages.

Name: ALTHAS AJI
Review: Had nice memorable time with friends

Name: Robert Christian Santos
Review: Free Roam VR is fun! Staff was great and super helpful. Highly recommend for group events.

Name: Wondwessen Shibeshi
Review: Teenagers will love it!!! Nice to have an outing with teen kids and be part of their changing lives.  We had a blast!

Name: Gerardo Avalos
Review: The controller can get a bit heavy but otherwise is extremely fun.

Name: Ziggy zigidford
Review: Great for kids and adults

Name: Bumble Bee
Review: It was such an amazing experience! The staff is very friendly and helpful. Highly recommended!

Name: Sam Queenfcf
Review: Hey its buffy i just wanna say it was the most intense game I ever played absolutely awesome experience the people who work there are so kind and helpful and make u feel comfortable. I'm definitely coming back with a bigger team

Name: Bertrand Milot
Review: Brilliant and immersive!

Name: ronak patel
Review: A great place for VR. It has proper space and the staff is very friendly and educative.

Name: Alana Dookheran
Review: Overall, we had a really fun time! My biggest pause for returning would be the the price but I would recommend it

Name: Jon Hill
Review: I went with three friends and had an exceptional experience. It is unlike any other Virtual Reality I have ever tried. We had a blast and highly recommend it.

Name: David Han
Review: One of the best VR experience that i have ever experienced thus far! Staff members were super friendly and very communicative to make sure we have the best experience during our stay here. The virtual room is massive making the experience far more realistic, not bound to a small area. 1000% recommend this place! Definitely recommend the game "outreak". It was unreal!

Name: David
Review: AJ and Ben were amazing, staff was amazing and exceptionally accommodating. The VR experience was amazing and there is a massive amount of space to! Will definitely come back, thank you! Very fun

Name: Alok K
Review: Great friendly staff.

Name: Ariel M
Review: Lovely staff that explained the whole process clearly and efficiently plus super friendly.  The gaming experience was really fun and exciting.  I will be back to play more games !

Name: Danny Sylvan Vlog
Review: Would 1000% recommend! I think it would be great for small group team building or a fun night amongst a group of friends.

Name: R D
Review: Ben and Quinn ensured we had an amazing experience. Their vibe made it an even more fun experience

Name: Robyn Cheung
Review: This was a great experience! The staff was very helpful and made the experience excellent! 10/10 recommend

Name: Shrutika Shetty
Review: I booked the party room for a surprise farewell! The experience with the VR, the room and the whole staff was nothing less than SPECTACULAR. Absolutely loved it. If your looking for an intimate party with your friends, this is your place! A must try!!

Name: Tiana Obad
Review: Had a great time, such a good experience. Really liked Ivan!

Name: Mitchell Lewer
Review: Is that a zombie grabbing my ankles...

Name: Isabel Tang
Review: I went with a group of 7 friends for the first time, and we had a lovely experience! The staff were exceptional and friendly, informative, took some photos/videos for us, and overall ensured we had a great time. I would definitely recommend this spot for anyone interested in doing a fun group activity! They have an amazing lounge space at the back where you can bring your own food/cake/drinks for parties and gatherings, all while watching the game being played live! 10/10 would visit again!

Name: George Abraham
Review: Amazing place. AJ and Ben were amazing

Name: Linh Thach DP
Review: 100% recommend. Great staff, great game, great experience

Name: David Shan
Review: Super fun, thanks AJ and crew

Name: Son
Review: wow!  this was an amazing  experience.  had a really great time.  love the ability to walk around and experience true VR.  they also email you results and video clips of your game play which is super awesome.  thank you Ben, Quynh and team.

Name: Ravi Parmar
Review: Quinn ben and AJ ARE GREAT

Name: Malcolm Hodgins
Review: Great staff and very immersive!

Name: Victor Olarve
Review: I visited with a group of 5 people, and our game masters, Kevin and Ben, were outstanding. Although we've played many games with various game masters in the past, Kevin and Ben truly stood out. They were incredibly accommodating, enjoyable to be around, and ensured our comfort and enjoyment throughout the experience. Our visit wouldn't have been the same without them, and we'll definitely return here in the future.

Name: Chris
Review: 10/10 VR spot. The space is huge with plenty of room for roaming around in VR. The hosts AJ and Ben are fantastic and walk you through everything. Great for couples, groups, parties, etc. Definitely will be back!

Name: Liam Tremblay
Review: first VR experience and it was so much fun

Name: Cal Mann
Review: Best VR experience I have been to, looking forward to coming back to try the PvP.

Name: leonard bairagee
Review: It was pretty fun, hard to get used to it you don't play vr, but you get used to it. Far cry was amazing, and the people were too.

Name: Mustafa Haq
Review: Gg go next too ez

Name: Priya Hegde
Review: We went in a group of 4 there were two more added to our game and we were split into teams of 3. One of us got separated. This was not expected

Name: Farhat Ullah
Review: Great experience. Awesome staff. Def doing it again

Name: Tina D
Review: So fun!

Name: Thai Phan
Review: Me and the boys went for zombie survival. It was very fun!

Name: Johann Keens-Douglas
Review: The most fun I've had this year.  Went with a group of 8 guys, (all decent gamers already) to play Outbreak Origins. We had an amazing experience. Went back in for a second round of Undead Arena. VR is top quality and very immersive. Haven't laughed that hard in a while. Highly Reccomend

Name: Dionysios Gosselin
Review: What a blast!  This was so awesome because of the space and the staff.  Out first VR activity and it will not be out last.  Our family fought off the zombie invasion and the system that they run for this is so cool.  30 minute adventure, gets the blood pumping and the reflexes going.

Name: Kim Westbrook
Review: Such a different experience and so much fun. The games are intense and you feel like you are actually there going up and down levels. A fun thing to do with friends or work event for team building. The staff are great and lots of help during the game to ensure you have the best experience.

Name: Alex Bowling
Review: Super friendly staff, bright and clean space, flawless technology and a totally reasonable price. Will definitely go back!

Name: Adam Willis
Review: Wonderful experience withJack and Kevin. Walked us through the process, they were fun and we will def come back with friends.

Name: Kadene Gayle
Review: Clean space. Staff was friendly and understanding, guided us through game with ease. Overall very chill and fun atmosphere. Thank you.

Name: Fernando Zheng
Review: Great customer service

Name: santiago Garcia
Review: This place was awesome! They wasted no time to get us set up and they were very helpful along the way. Shout out to Ben and Kevin for the awesome service!

Name: Bartholomew Mayonnaise
Review: I love VR and Ben is the best gamemaster

Name: Terence Wood
Review: This was so realistic

Name: Vanessa Sherwood
Review: So much fun! Ben was super helpful - thank you!

Name: Basil Hassan
Review: One of the most exciting experiences that I have ever had. From the second we walked in we were greeted with great customer service and professionalism by Ben and Kevin! Definitely coming back again!

Name: Daniel Koshy
Review: Had an amazing time at Zero Latency Toronto. The staff, Ajay, David, Nick and Ben were all super friendly and well versed in the VR games we played. Would absolutely love to come back with a bigger group and definitely recommend this spot to anyone wanting to try something new and unique in Toronto!

Name: Neeraj
Review: Costs about 63 dollars per person. Only 8 people can play at a time. Book in advance to reserve your spot. Paid street parking available next to the place.

Name: Shrirang Kumbhojkar
Review: An awesome experience!

Name: Property Claims
Review: Super amazing time, came with group of 3 and had a lot of fun!

Name: Kenny
Review: Good experience

Name: Quinn
Review: Went earlier today with some friends and we had a blast. The game masters Dat, Ben and Aj were very friendly and kept everything running smoothly. Would recommend!

Name: yonge wang
Review: Fun vr games to play with friendly staff,  the game master David helped us learn and improve, definitely a spot I suggest bringing friends with

Name: Kevin Li
Review: Booked a session for Sunday July 16th 2023. Great customer service and answered all our questions. Our group of 6 all had a blast. There were 4 of us in the group that had glasses. 3 of the 4 fit in the set while the 4th one switched to transition sunglasses with a smaller frame. The game was fun as we had never done VR again and we would definitely come back!

Name: Adriano C
Review: Good VR option very high tech

Name: Rhaps X
Review: First time trying out VR in the city! Ben was great, he explained everything short and swift and my party was in-game and having fun within minutes!

Name: cozy
Review: We came last minute and staff was very accommodating! Thank you Ben and staff! Very fun and unique VR experience.

Name: Leo Cui
Review: Would highly recommend for anybody

Name: Tae Jung “Ray” Kim
Review: dude named ben was cool

Name: Joni -
Review: Ben was an amazing host, super clear instructions and made sure everyone had a BLAST!!!

Name: Usao
Review: Ben was awesome

Name: Ricky Shukla
Review: Great space, great employees and awesome experience

Name: Chase Potter
Review: First VR experience yesterday and this was an absolute blast! The team was fantastic and we will be back. Highly recommend!

Name: Josh Petersel
Review: So cool!!!

Name: Nazim
Review: Experience as a whole was a 9, Ben made it a 10.

Name: ZGMF BLITZ
Review: Ben was very entertaining and super helpful

Name: James Adams
Review: Took my brother and 9 friends here for his bachelor party and it was unreal.  For a group that has never done VR before,  getting to be fully immerse into the game where you can walk and run with your team was super cool.  Highly recommend if you're looking to coming again.

Name: Ben Gunning
Review: Went with my daughter and had a really great time.   Games were very fun and vivid but, to top it off, the staff was absolutely awesome.  Our game lord was George and he was super enthusiastic and friendly.  Highly recommended.

Name: Brandon Wells
Review: Had a great time with game master Eric and Kevin!

Name: Delphine Ji
Review: 10/10 Super friendly and everything you could ask for!! Thanks Kevin!!

Name: Eric Levchuk
Review: Super friendly staff, games are amazing and fun! Definitely worth trying if you like VR

Name: Harbir Rehill
Review: This was too much fun. Definitely coming back

Name: Marcello Cabezas
Review: Incredible one of a kind experience- we will be back. GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE.

Name: Muhammad Aaliyan
Review: Awesome experience! Do check these guys out. Jay and nick were amazing, also gave us an extra playtime at the end our session

Name: Chris Smith
Review: Great experience, took the family incl a 10 year old.  Well organized and friendly staff, free lockers for your stuff while you play.  Headsets were very comfy, I wore my glasses with no issues.  The time blew by,  no comparison to the oculus, so much better.  Highly recommend and looking forward to going back.

Name: JP Taillon
Review: Great fun, had no motion sickness, free roam experience is really cool!

Name: kush patel
Review: Fun time. AJ was great helper and guided well.

Name: Johnny Dabo
Review: Dope OFF!

Name: Jeffrey W
Review: Went in a group of 4 on Friday around noon. AJ and Kevin were awesome and helpful hosts who made our first VR experience pleasant and memorable. I highly recommend this place and would visit again in the future.

Name: Tanya Dasgupta
Review: I absolutely love this VR experience. Everyone should try each of their games.

Name: Kayden Nguyen
Review: Amazing experience! Gamemasters AJ and Kevin were great, one of the best customer service I ever received. 10/10 Would definitely come back and recommend it!

Name: DeA Bertola
Review: Best experience, we had a birthday party and not only the staff is super friendly and funny but they helped making this experience so amazing. 100% recommended and we will be back

Name: Fabiola
Review: Amazing group activity. Great staff!!!

Name: Zafer Zuhair
Review: We will definitely be back again!

Name: Harshavardhan Reddy
Review: The vr game experience was amazing. It was totally worth the time and money. Thank you game master for a wonderful and adventurous experience. Looking forward to visit again.

Name: Harikrishnan C S
Review: Great experience. Thank you guys and especially Dat was awesome.

Name: Arnol Regi
Review: Good place to have fun might be a bit pricey but worth it. Come in a group of 8 for good ones. Overall liked it, we got dat as the gamemaster and he was pretty good

Name: Annegret Dahlmann-Noor
Review: Amazing and mindblowing experience! Went with family (mum/dad, 3 teenagers) and had the perfect afternoon. I'm Mum, hadn't played any computer games for a long time, and found the immersive experience utterly awesome. Walking through a different world - so different from just wearing a VR headset whilst sitting still in one  position. Would highly recommend for parties, team outings and family days!

Name: Lindsay Watkins
Review: This place was so fun, highly recommend going with a group of friends. And the game masters Ben and AJ were so friendly and made the experience awesome. Will definitely go again!

Name: Robin Li
Review: Zero Latency offers a top-notch virtual reality gaming experience that is truly unforgettable. AJ and Ben, the knowledgeable and friendly staff, make sure that every gamer feels safe and comfortable while playing with their cutting-edge VR gear. The attention to detail in their games creates a completely immersive experience that will leave any gamer thrilled. Overall, Zero Latency is a must-try for anyone looking for an unparalleled gaming adventure

Name: Sam Rodgers
Review: Outdid our expectations! Such a fun gaming experience. Will definitely be back with to do a bigger group play. Kevin and Eric were awesome as our guides through setup and gameplay! Really great space!

Name: Ayman Mohatarem
Review: My friends and I came here to play far cry 3! It was such an amazing experience. We're already planning when to come again and try a different game. All the employees were  super friendly. Really great experience!

Name: Charlotte Pagcaliwagan
Review: It was such an amazing VR reality game experience. The staff members are friendly and approachable, they made sure we are all set up before the start of the game, to have the best and most enjoyable experience. Thanks to Ben and David who made sure to keep us safe during the game. We had a blast!! Definitely recommended!

Name: Yuvraj Maan
Review: Its amazing but little expensive, enjoyed a lot, staff was very professional, will visit again soon

Name: Jack Lee
Review: Enjoyed this a lot with my group of 4 friends. First real VR experience and being able to walk around during game is amazing.

Name: Oscar Hernandez
Review: This place is awesome!! super friendly staff, huge clean space to play on with really cool and fun games. Super fun VR experience, will return soon!

Name: Bethany Lam
Review: Would definitely come back!

Name: Connor Fraser
Review: This place was an absolute blast! It's a very different experience compared to using a VR headset at home. I highly recommend their PvP games

Name: Alex Trainor
Review: By far the coolest experience ever. An absolute must try!!

Name: Jiyan Dogan
Review: The no-wall experience of VR was amazing as well. We had so much fun here.

Name: David Resnick
Review: This is NEXT LEVEL VR with movement. Unbelievably cool and fun. At first you feel like you're walking on a different planet, then you find your VR legs and can really get into it. Lots of different games/worlds to choose from. Staff is super friendly and helpful. Try it -- you won't be disappointed.

Name: Gagandeep Singh
Review: It was a really fun experience and the guys there were really nice too. Definitely will go there again. Superb experience!!

Name: Josh Messer
Review: Came here from out of town one of the best places I been to in Toronto. If you own a VR head set this is a step above! So much fun and the staff is incredible!

Name: Gavin Power
Review: Went with a team from work - great time shooting zombies! Thanks for the fun.

Name: Ali Jomaa
Review: Awesomw experience, must try

Name: NoOdLeS
Review: Kids loved it. It would have been nice for longer game play staff are nice and accommodating.  The only issue is parking.

Name: A Ahmed
Review: Shawn and the whole team were amazing. Friendly staff and such a great place to experience VR with friends! Best experience hands down! Will definitely be returning!

Name: Mariia Ryzhenko
Review: We came to play Far Cry VR. That was a special experience indeed. A fun and immersive way to spend the 30 min of your life and get out from the routine. I would say that the graphics of the game looks fine but not the best. However, for VR is is a good quality.

Name: Bassant
Review: One of the best experiences me and my friends have ever had! Incredibly fun VR experience, we played outbreak origins and had an absolute blast. One thing to also note is the welcoming attitude of the workers! They are so genuine and care for your experience. If I could go beyond 5 stars I would. Amazing job guys, keep it up.

Name: Justin O'Heir
Review: This is the next generation of lazer tag, so much fun!

Name: Serhii Semeniako
Review: The experience was super cool! We played 2 sesions ( farcry and zombies) games there. Both game are amazing! Host was very-very helpful! I definitely recommend this place to play!

Name: Farhad Rashidi
Review: We went there on a gloomy stormy day and the whole experience brightened up our day. The staff were super helpful, accommodating, and sweet. We will definitely revisit. We tried Far Cry and the Zombie. The former was surreal. Get ready to get high without psychedelics. Try the Zombie for adrenaline rush. Thank you Zero Latency for a lovely experience. We will see you soon.

Name: Wyatt Currie
Review: Zero Latency was my first VR experience and it was incredible. The games were immersive and the huge arena provided so much freedom! Loved Singularity and Undead Arena. The headset and gun were lightweight and easy to use. I will be coming back, and would highly recommend it for any event or occasion! Thanks again to Ben and Nico for an amazing experience!

Name: Weena Potter
Review: We had a wonderful time! Fun staff and organized space. The games are awesome too! Will be back for sure

Name: Andrew Bell
Review: Overall had an amazing time. Loved the zombie games and sol raiders. Outbreak origin was my favorite it was a ton of fun. I loved the shot gun and special weapons in it.

Name: parham gorjizadeh
Review: Great experience, awesome games, zombie was insane

Name: Frankie Cena
Review: Amazing Customer Service - Dezz was wonderful and energetic, the owner seemed to really care about the product/experience. Slightly expensive, but a great experience.

Name: Delly
Review: Super fun!! Lovely staff, great games and such a big space you get all to yourself. Loved it!

Name: fintan mckenna
Review: Amazing experience. The advancement in the technology is incredible. Played a zombie shooter style game which was thrilling and exciting. The lightness of the equipment, lends itselfto the experience, as you are not burdened by its presenc. You almost forget that you are wearing anything at all. Great experience, backed up by even better staff. Highly recommend

Name: Cee Camille
Review: My first time and had such an amazing time. Would definitely recommend and be back. Both hosts explained everything really well and in detail. Thank you for a great first experience.

Name: Kadijha Brown
Review: Siiiick VR place! You gotta try it! Fun and open concept. I'm definitely coming back.

Name: Javish Soriano
Review: Nice game, nice people, and nice environment. Thank you Dezz.

Name: Alex Rollins
Review: Everything was great. It's the first time I've tried something like that and I'm looking forward to coming back to you.

Name: RadomirFM
Review: Absolutely incredible experience. You should try.

Name: Jean-Renauld Y.C. TIDI-HEBHANG
Review: Definitely recommending the place.

Name: Mahad Khokhar
Review: Would go again!

Name: Danny Tseng
Review: Went there with friends and had a complete blast. The virtual reality experience was immersive and surprising rigorous - expect to get a great workout without realizing it for the zombie game. There was a wide variety of games to play as well. Service was exceptional - the staff explained the procedure clearly, ensured our gear worked well and we had everything we needed. Highly recommended!

Name: Luke Bertozzi
Review: Absolutely mind blowing!The VR technology was top-notch and the games were totally impressive. 10/10 would recommend this experience to anyone looking for a truly unique and thrilling activity. The staff was also friendly and helpful.

Name: Samuel Triplett
Review: Great spot, great staff, and fun games!!
